text:
Created attachment 24442
Sample FO file showing the issue

See attached file. There's a blue rectangle missing at the bottom of the first
cell. The value of the space-after property in the second cell hasn't been
taken into account in the calculation of the table's height.

Hi Vincent,

Thanks for your bug report. This has been fixed in rev. 830996 of the Trunk:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=830996&view=rev

Vincent
